key.name: event-update-rate-ms
key.summary: How often XR related events should be processed
key.description: This affects events like polling the XR runtime for updated tracked device poses, determining if a controller points at an overlay, and performing window management. This value is also the basis for the overlay push/pull and scale functions to be fps independent.

key.name: scroll-threshold
key.summary: How big of a touchpad movement should generate a scroll event
key.description: The touchpad values range from -1.0 to 1.0 in both directions. Moving the finger about this value on the touchpad causes a scroll event to be emitted akin to a mousewheel being turned one position.

key.name: scroll-to-push-ratio
key.summary: How much the push/pull gesture should be amplified
key.description: While dragging a window, the touchpad or thumbstick can push/pull a window away or nearer. This value determines how fast this happens.

key.name: overlay-minimum-size-meter
key.summary: The minimum size of a window
key.description: Windows are prevented from being scaled smaller than this value.

key.name: overlay-maximum-size-meter
key.summary: The maximum size of a window
key.description: Windows are prevented from being scaled bigger than this value.

key.name: pointer-tip-resolution
key.summary: The pixel resolution of the pointer tip.
key.description: This option has no effect on the visible size of the pointer tip. Higher resolutions only result in improved quality. Note: Texture resolution will be double this value so animations can be up to 2x the pointer size without having to allocate a bigger texture.

key.name: constant-pointer-tip-width
key.summary: Whether the pointer tip should get smaller the farther it is away
key.description: This option disables the expected perspective of the pointer tip getting smaller when it is farther away.

key.name: pointer-tip-width-screenspace
key.summary: The width of the pointer tip in screen space
key.description: This option only applies when the constant-pointer-tip-width option is enabled.

key.name: pointer-tip-width-meter
key.summary: The width of the pointer tip in world space (meter)
key.description: This option applies when the constant-pointer-tip-width option is disabled, and when the constant-pointer-tip-width is enabled, but the HMD pose can not be determined.

key.name: active-pointer-tip-color
key.summary: The color of an active pointer tip e.g. pointing at an overlay

key.name: pointer-tip-animation-alpha
key.summary: The opaqueness of the pointer tip animation

key.name: inactive-pointer-tip-color
key.summary: The color of an inactive pointer tip i.e. not point at anything
